text: Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwaŵan'gumbile ŵanganyammwe kuumila mwa mundu jumpepe (Adam), nijwaaŵisile kuumila mwa jwalakwejo ŵankwakwe (Hawa), kuti jutulalileje (jwannume jwalijose) kwa ŵele (ŵankwakweo). Sano ndema jaakwaakumbatilaga, akasajigalaga (ŵammasyetowo) nsigo wakwepepala, ni akasajendagajendaga nao, nambo pati upesile (nsigowo nikusigala panandi kuŵeleka) ŵanaŵaŵili (ŵalume ni ŵankwao) akasam’bombaga Allah M'mbuje gwao (kuti): “Naga nkutupa mwanache jwambone (jwalungalunga) chisimu chituŵe mu ŵakutogolela.”
